=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Luxury Conditioner With Aloe Vera - Hair Deep Conditioning for Dry Damaged Hair - Natural & Organic Moisturizing Hair Repair Treatment for Hair Loss Split Ends Dry & Itchy Scalp - Color Safe (8 oz) Review Date: 2016/08/13 Store: Organic Prestige Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Organic Prestige', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7.25 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '603404817160'} Review Text: I have medium length naturally wavy, processed hair that tends to be frizzy if I don’t use good hair products, especially conditioner. After coming across this conditioner, it sounded perfect for my hair, so I decided to give it a try. The bottle itself is streamline and attractive, containing all of the pertinent information such as ingredients, directions, cautions, company information, and Made in the USA. I like that it is also paraben-free, sulfate-free, cruelty-free, organic, and vegan. The easy flip-top lid is very helpful in dispensing the conditioner and I am always happy when a product comes with a tamper-proof seal in place, as this did.

This conditioner is beautifully creamy, thick, and rich and smells wonderfully fresh and citrusy, uplifting and delicious, and is perfect for men and women. I have been washing my hair as usual, applying this conditioner and then using a wide-tooth comb to remove any tangles, after which I leave the conditioner on while I shave my legs and wash my body. This gives the conditioner a little extra time to do lovely things for my hair. I then gently pat my hair dry with my towel, apply a light Argan serum, and then let it air dry the rest of the way. I love how soft and smooth this conditioner makes my hair feel. Review Title: ~ Softening and Smoothing with a Delicious Light True Citrus Scent. ~ Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** Prefers high-quality hair care products specifically designed for dry and damaged hair. 
- **Product Attributes:** Values natural, organic, paraben-free, sulfate-free, cruelty-free, and vegan formulations. 
- **Application Method:** Enjoys a thorough application process, using products in combination with other personal care routines (e.g., shaving). 
- **Scent Preference:** Prefers products with fresh and uplifting scents, specifically citrus fragrances. 
- **Ease of Use:** Appreciates functional packaging, such as easy-to-use flip-top lids and tamper-proof seals.
- **User Experience:** Finds satisfaction in products that leave hair feeling soft, smooth, and manageable, often complementing with additional treatments like serums.
- **Target Audience:** Products seem to be suitable for all genders, indicating an inclusive approach to hair care. 

Overall, this user values effective, ethically produced hair care solutions that enhance the overall hair health experience while integrating seamlessly into personal grooming routines.
